panels.description: Forecasted hourly cost per node with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (optimistic), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (pessimistic) cost predictions.
panels.title: Node Hourly Cost Forecast

panels.description: Forecasted CPU core count per node with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (low estimate), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (high estimate).
panels.title: Node CPU Cores Forecast

panels.description: Forecasted CPU utilization percentage per node with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (low utilization), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (high utilization).
panels.title: Node CPU Utilisation Forecast

panels.description: Forecasted memory utilization percentage per node with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (low usage), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (high usage).
panels.title: Node Memory Utilisation Forecast

panels.description: Forecasted hourly cost at cluster level with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (optimistic), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (pessimistic) cost predictions.
panels.title: Cluster Hourly Cost Forecast

panels.description: Forecasted CPU utilization percentage at cluster level with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (low utilization), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (high utilization).
panels.title: Cluster CPU Utlisation

panels.description: Forecasted memory utilization percentage at cluster level with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (low usage), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (high usage) predictions.
panels.title: Memroy Utlisation

panels.description: Forecasted number of nodes per cluster with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (minimum nodes), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (maximum nodes) predictions.
panels.title: Node Count Per Cluster

panels.description: Forecasted total memory utilization per cluster with confidence intervals. Shows q0.1 (low utilization), q0.5 (median forecast), and q0.9 (high utilization) predictions.
panels.title: Total Memory Utilization Per Cluster
